title: Will there be another series of The Circle?
text:
Tim Wilson (left) became the People’s Champion on series two of The Circle, but will presenter Emma Willis be back with the Channel 4 contest for a third series? (Picture: Channel 4)

Series three of The Circle will have a tough act to follow in the aftermath of last night’s series two finale, when Paddy Smyth was announced as the winner of the £70,000 prize in an emotional episode.

Smyth, who reached the final five in the reality show after joining as a latecomer, won the popularity vote among the finalists to become the second winner of the Channel 4 series.

The show, in which contestants interact with each other entirely through a social media network, has seen ratings rise from the last series, including a leap from a million to 1.3 million viewers for the opening episode.

Wondering whether we’ll see The Circle again next year? Here’s what we know so far…

Will The Circle season 2 be the last series of the show?

We’re not fully sure whether there will be another series of The Circle, but the timeline leading up to the latest series could provide a few clues about when its future will be revealed.

Channel 4 extended the second series of The Circle after it was picked up globally by Netflix towards the end of 2018.

Ian Katz, the channel’s Controller, told TBI he was ‘confident’ that expanding the show to incorporate more live elements on a broader scale would make it ‘bigger and better.’

The broadcaster announced the news in January, so we can reasonably expect to find out whether there will be a third instalment at the start of next year.

According to Deadline, Katz is ‘hot’ on the series, which is being adapted for a version in the US.

Can I apply to be on The Circle series three?

Contestants on a potential new series of The Circle are certain to have the chance to appear alongside more high-profile names, with the likes of presenter Richard Madeley and Woody Cook, who is the son of Norman Cook and Zoe Ball, taking part this year.

There’s also the small matter of the top prize on offer, which is likely to be more than the £70,000 won by Smyth this year.

Creators Studio Lambert say they are looking for ‘confident people who are prepared to be put to the test’ when they select contestants for the complex where The Circle is filmed.
